about_the_game:
How many games can you play at once? Unlock your hidden potential with Super Multitasking GO! Using an intuitive control scheme and your amazing gaming skills, you'll soon be playing up to 4 minigames at a time! Discover how far you can go, wow your streaming audience, and compete with players around the world!

The screen is split into 4 portions, each controlled by a different part of your gamepad: left stick, right stick, face buttons, and top buttons. You can use your keyboard as well! You'll use these "mini-screens" to play minigames as they appear and disappear, shuffling in and out. You'll start with just one at a time, but before you know it, you'll be unlocking your hidden talents and playing multiple minigames at once!

The Tutorial allows you to learn the basics in just 2 minutes! Then, try the Quickplay mode! It starts off easy and gets tougher as you go. Last as long as possible without making any mistakes! How far can you go? Aim for the top of the Leaderboards!

Next, you can take the challenge of Mission Mode's 15 unique scenarios. How many can you clear? If you get stuck, you can adjust the difficulty to make it easier.

This infinitely-replayable workout for your brain is full of options and surprises! It's great at parties, for warming up before long gaming sessions, or for pushing yourself to your limits! Your streaming audience will cheer you on and celebrate when you clear tough Missions or set new personal bests! Experience it with your friends for a night of screams, shouts, and cheers! It's wild, unpredictable, and a ton of fun...it's Super Multitasking GO!

You can also play Minigame and Multitasking Training modes to help build your skills! All of this is completely FREE! If you want more, check out the "GO Beyond!" DLC to add even more fun and challenge! And if you want even more than that, check out Super Duper Multitasking!

Note:

This Free-to-Play version contains a subset of Super Duper Multitasking's minigames that is unique to this version. Its Missions are also unique, and do not appear in Super Duper Multitasking.

name: Super Multitasking GO!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo P8600, equivalent, or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 200 series, AMD Radeon HD 5000 series, Intel HD Graphics 4000, equivalent, or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Yes, YOU can play up to 4 continuously-shuffling minigames at the same time, using just a split screen and a single controller or keyboard! Super Multitasking GO! offers the tools and the training...but YOU unlock your hidden potential!
